h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Loong Balm Location
content: Loong Balm is found in The Emerald Hall in Furnace Valley in the Flaming Mountains. In this location, it can be found up the stairs and towards the large hall with the throne, sitting next to it.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Loong_Balm.md', within the main section titled 'Loong Balm', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Loong Balm Location'.
The content is as follows:
Loong Balm is found in The Emerald Hall in Furnace Valley in the Flaming Mountains. In this location, it can be found up the stairs and towards the large hall with the throne, sitting next to it.
